data.title: The Sound of Shivaji Dev
data.meta_description: INÂ some ways we are all the same. We all have the same human nature. We share a common humanity.We all have human bodies and human minds, we all have human thoughts and human feelings. Yet in other ways we are all completely different and unique. No two people are truly alike. No two people canâ€¦
data.text:
Who am I? Iâ€™m Shivaji Dev, hailing from the family of Tamil film historyâ€™s greatest actor and one of the best actors of world cinema. I am Sivaji Ganesanâ€™s grandson & son of G.Ramkumar & Meenakshi Ramkumar, nephew of yester year actress Sripriya.

I have my true & individual passion for films. Iâ€™m the wackiest person in my family and have lots of pressure to overcome with and have loads of patience to beat it. The time & skies are surrounding me & Iâ€™m confident that I can sense my success for my honest work. Iâ€™m a hungry actor who will be always in all ways & I love my work .Even my most dear ones my family & friends comes laterâ€¦

What is your antidote when Motivation and Focus Dwindle?

When my focus & motivation dwindle, I just look back at my growth and realize that I have not been idle, but I at least have given it a try. My biggest antidote is Walt Disney & his quotes ðŸ™‚

How do you respond to someone who has hurt you?

I have learned to control my anger in recent times & just ignore that particular time when someone hurts me with silence. By the time they feel guilty & hesitate to talk to me and when they see me later, I go to them & say hi!!!!!

According to you, what is true happiness ?

According to me my true happiness is when my dream comes true & I live happily forever with my family & friends. That is more than enough for me ðŸ™‚

What are your biggest fears in life?

My biggest fear is heights!!! Iâ€™m a total acrophobia!! but i donâ€™t like to have the word fear in my life, so starting to come through it!!

What is real beauty according to you?

I see real beauty in children & new born babies :).They are the true creation of nature.Their beauty has no words to explain!!!

What is your favorite quote and why?

I have a lot of favorite quotes because thatâ€™s what keeps me going strong. In particular the below two are my most favorite.
